alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 10:25AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Greene, north central Lenoir and central Pitt Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1024 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Snow Hill, or 9 miles north of Kinston, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Winterville, Ayden, Farmville, Grifton, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Dawson, Maury, Ormondsville, Institute, Roundtree, Lizzie, Kinston Regional Jetport and Hookerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
